answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:
Richard – I hope the following is helpful:
New York State Center of Excellence for Cultural Competence: Cultural Competence Assessment Tools
http://www.nyspi.org/culturalcompetence/what/pdf/NYSPI-CECC_CulturalCompetenceAssessment.pdf 
Portsmouth, VA - Cultural Diversity Plan:  2011 -2013
http://www.portsmouthva.gov/behaviorhealthcareservices/docs/CulturalDiversityPlan20112013.pdf 
Greenbook Project, El Paso County, CO – Cultural Competency Organizational Self-Assessment Toolkit
http://www.thegreenbook.info/documents/El_Paso_toolkit.pdf 
The Common Wealth Fund - A Framework for Cultural Competency: Measurement and Accountability
http://www.commonwealthfund.org/Publications/Commentaries/2006/Oct/A-Framework-for-Cultural-Competency--Measurement-and-Accountability.aspx 
Sage Journals - Development and Validation of the Cultural Competence of Program Evaluators (CCPE) Self-Report Scale
http://aje.sagepub.com/content/33/4/496.abstract 
NY Office of Mental Health - Cultural Competence Assessment Tools
http://www.omh.ny.gov/omhweb/cultural_competence/assessment_tools.html 
CULTURAL COMPETENCY ORGANIZATIONAL ASSESSMENT QUESTIONNAIRE
http://www.wiphl.org/uploads/media/Organizational_Assessment.pdf 
Pam
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450 Office
480-231-3538 Text
pmuse@transformgov.org
www.transformgov.org

answers.author: Richard Siegel
answers.text:
Thanks, Pam for the links.  Remember to call me next time you come up to Bellevue.


Thanks, Pam for the links.  Remember to call me next time you come up to Bellevue.

answers.author: Michael Van Milligen
answers.text:
Richard,
Intercultural Competency is a priority of our Mayor and City Council and has been for several years. We have active internal and community programs. Human Rights Director Kelly Larson leads the efforts in Dubuque. You can reach her at klarson@cityofdubuque.org.
Mike

author: Richard Siegel
text: How do other municipalities measure ‘cultural competency’ within their staff and service delivery?
title: Cultural Competency
